title: Did not get the skin i asked for to keep on the reset
body: https://image.prntscr.com/image/zlJlOmRSQ1iC_E33VN1hiA.png I asked to keep lil devil teemo and and i didnt get on the reset. https://image.prntscr.com/image/38inMcSGQBynnWidrsLq7A.png

replies.body: There wasn't any way for us to make you keep certain offers. If you got one skin the first time around and still want that one, hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
I have sent a ticket no one is responding to it...TICKET #31800457
Sorry it's taken a bit for your response, those agents look a tiny bit backed up from all the Your Shop tickets. It looks like someone was able to shoot you a response not too long ago though!
